name: Palo Santo Bundles
description:
Traditionally, the bark of the “holy wood” has been used in ceremony and healing ritual across the Americas for hundreds of years. Under great respect, only the branches that have fallen are collected for use. No living tree is harmed. 

Belonging to the same Family as Frankincense and Myrrh, the powerful resin and oil of palo santo heals at a great caliber for the human spirit. 

Each bundle of hand-chiseled palo santo are wrapped with a variety of foraged dried flowers and silk ribbon. Untie the silk ribbon and dried flowers, then light one end of the wood. Fan the smoke across your body or in your space. Use for relaxation or set aside for the most worthy intention. 

Each bundle contains 2-3 pieces of palo santo. Variations occur.

name: Medicinal Mushroom Honeys
description:
Raw Central Texas honey is slow infused with only the freshest plants and other unique and enriching herbal ingredients supported by a global materia medica of wisdom. 

Our distinctive, mushroom infused honeys follows the rich traditions of healing fungi used in Eastern and Western cultures. Stir a teaspoon into tea or impress with a new twist on a signature cocktail. 


✥ Rosehip with Reishi & Maitake Mushroom

    A restorative blend of adaptogenic medicinal 
    mushrooms supported with rosehips, a rich source of 
    antioxidants and Vitamin C. This full-bodied honey   
    provides a great support in strengthening the 
    body against the effects of a stressful lifestyle.  


::  separation occurs naturally 
stir well before using.  ::

options.name: Nettles with Ashwagandha & Lions Mane Mushroom

name: Four Storms Fire Cider
description:
Lunar : Ancient : Buried Treasure 

Four Storms Fire Cider fortifies an ancient recipe with a time honored, potent blend of stimulating herbs to keep our immune system in top shape. Take 2 droppers full, 3-4 times a day at the first sign of cold or flu. May be taken as a daily tonic, 3-4 drops under the tongue or diluted in water. Seasonal formula. Available in the Fall/Winter. 

✥Burdock Root/Turmeric Root/GingerRoot
Garlic/Onion/Thyme
Elderberries/Kelp/Serranos
Cayenne/Sage Honey/Apple Cider Vinegar

name: Wildflower Smudge Bundles
description:
Inspired by the harmonizing use of white sage for healing, each one of a kind bundle contains a variety of foraged botanicals arranged and wrapped with graceful intention. Burn the floral bundles to change the energy of your surroundings or place in your most adored space. 

✥  flowers & foliage vary and change during the seasons. Each bundle    is reflective of abundance.

name: Fireside Herbal Smoke Blend
description:
Created to bring the sacred ritual of smoke to your daily life, smoking can be a time to step out of your daily routine, meditate and release. Each blend is a useful tool for decreasing tobacco consumption. All herbs are from trusted sources or found in healthy stands in the Central Texas area. 

No. 1 
A blend of six herbs to encourage clarity & vision 
while charming away even the most disruptive oppositions. 
✥Lobelia/Damiana/Catnip/Mullein
Yerba Santa/Lemon Balm

No. 2
A divine blend of calming herbs useful for relaxation 
& ease while opening the heart to gentleness. 
Enhances and recalls dreams. (seasonal)
✥Mugwort/Passionflower/Rose/Sage/Cornsilk

No. 3
A heroic blend of lung supporting herbs to nourish the 
respiratory system, while Wild Lettuce, Lactuca virosa, 
quiets the hyperactive mind and restless body. 
✥Wild Lettuce/Chamomile/Mullein/Coltsfoot

No tobacco || No synthetics

Each bulk tin rolls close to 20 cigarettes.

name: Lucero
description:
A sweet and nostalgic botanical perfume balm. A base of organic grapeseed oil and beeswax with essential oils of Mysore Sandalwood, Palo Santo, Lavender and Coriander. This distinctive blend exudes a rich accord of flowering gardens, elegant Indian musk and sweet wood resins. 

|| Accompanied with Azurite and Apache Tears ||

Azurite stimulates the pursuit for higher awareness and the intuitive self. Mellow the intellect with love and inspire actualization with Apache Tears.

Rub the perfume with your fingertips to generate heat. Apply to your pulse points and crown, as often as you desire. 

:: available in .5 oz. ::

name: Veedha
description:
A feminine and totemic botanical perfume balm. This perfume blend is a homecoming. A base of raw honey, beeswax & organic grapeseed oil infused with delicate rose petals and blended perfectly with a combination of essential and absolute oils of rose geranium, black pepper & basil. 

|| Accompanied with Pyrite ||

Pyrite enhances willpower and mental clarity while encouraging harmony in the mind and body. 

Rub the perfume with your fingertips to generate heat. Apply to your pulse points and heart center as often as you desire. While it is minimal in form, it possesses an intimate affirmation of great power. 

::  available in .5 oz  ::
